helpsections.title: 后台帮助系统
helpsections.helptext:
欢迎来到后台帮助系统
这个系统将提供您关于一些特殊设置和管理页面方面的更加完善的信息.
For pages that hold more information, you will see a box just like this one.
For individual settings, an image will appear next to them, which you can click for more information. The image will appear as:

You can minimize each box by using the minimize icon in the top right of each box. To turn these help boxes off:
Click here to be sent to the settings page for this.
Alternatively you can simply navigate to the Tools & Settings tab, click on General Configuration, and then set ACP Help System to No.

helpsections.title: Sending Bulk Emails
helpsections.helptext: When you send an email, a task on the board is triggered to send a certain amount of emails at once. Please note that in order for these tasks to run there must be activity the board itself. If you notice the Post Office is not sending your emails, please browse your board and actively browse for around 10 or so minutes. This should trigger the tasks needed to send the emails.

helpsections.title: What settings should I pick?
helpsections.helptext:
Simple Backup
This function compiles a single back up file and prompts a browser dialogue box for you to save the file. This can only be used on small databases
Normally the best results come from leaving the settings how they are. If you do experience issues, you may want to skip the non-essential data and enabling GZIP.
Larger databases may time out using this tool. If this happens for you, please contact your webhost. They should be able to provide you with a backup. If you have SSH access to your site, our Knowledge Base provides manual backup instructions using SSH.

helpsections.title: 权限设置
helpsections.helptext:
创建一个新论坛板块的时候,请选择哪些用户组可以查看此论坛,在此论坛投票,上传/下载附件.您可以在下面找到相关设置.如果您不设置的话,任何人都不能查看此论坛,包括管理员在内.
创建新论坛分区的时候,您也需要选择哪些用户组可以查看此论坛分区.

helpsections.title: 权限设置
helpsections.helptext:
创建一个新论坛板块的时候,请选择哪些用户组可以查看此论坛,在此论坛投票,上传/下载附件.您可以在下面找到相关设置.如果您不设置的话,任何人都不能查看此论坛,包括管理员在内..
创建新论坛分区的时候,您也需要选择哪些用户组可以查看此论坛分区.

helpsections.title: 管理已经存在的论坛
helpsections.helptext:
当您需要 编辑设置,更改权限,或者删除一个已经存在的板块/分区的时候,您可以在您的目标板块/分区的右边,点击下拉菜单来执行操作.这在您决定谁是否能看查看目标板块/分区的时候显得特别有用.
如果您添需要加,删除,或者编辑已经存在的版主,最简单的方法就是点击下面的显示版主.已经存在的版主就会在他们管理的板块旁边显示出来.如果您需要为一个已经存在的板块添加版主,您可以选中此板块,滚动在页面的底部,在输入框内输入此版主的会员名字为所有选择的板块添加版主(s).

helpsections.title: Finding & Pruning Members
helpsections.helptext:
You can Search for a member on your forum from here. Just enter any or none of the fields to bring up the results. On the next page you can edit their account by clicking the drop-down next to their name.
To Prune / Mass Delete members, simply select Find Members to Prune (Mass Delete) for the field Type of Search. You will also need to select some restrictions on who to prune, so fill in the other fields as desired.

helpsections.title: Password Salt & Login Key
helpsections.helptext: In most cases, you can leave these two settings how they are. These are just unique member settings held in the database used for logging in.

helpsections.title: Manage User Registration/Email Change Queues
helpsections.helptext:
This section will allow you to approve any members awaiting validation. Next to their name it will show if they are waiting Admin Validation, Email Validation, COPPA Validation, or if they are awaiting an Email Change validation email.

You can approve or deny registrations by using the checkboxes to the right of their name, and the drop-down menu at the bottom of the list.

If users are having trouble receiving their validation emails, you can re-send them from this page using the same drop-down menu as used for approving or denying members.

helpsections.title: Copyright Removal
helpsections.helptext:
Please Note: This is not the same as the IPB License Key. The Copyright Removal is a separate license that must be purchased.

To purchase this license, please contact our sales department.
If you are having issues adding the Copyright Removal license, please create a new support ticket. Ensure that you include your board URL, access to a ROOT Admin account to your board, and the key you are trying to use.

helpsections.title: 管理主题设置
helpsections.helptext:
您可以在这里查看和更改您的论坛主题.您可以点击每一款主题右边的下拉菜单直接修改此主题. 如果您需要创建一个新的未编辑默认主题,您可以点击 主题设置右边的下拉菜单来实现.下面是页面图标的相关说明:
- 这个图标显示出哪一款主题正在被用做论坛默认主题.您可以在其他的主题后面点亮此图标来设置此主题为默认主题.
- 这个图标显示哪些论坛主题可用.您可以点击这个图标来隐藏或者显示会员可以自己选择的主题.
- 这个图标显示此主题已经被某一个特殊的板块使用.

helpsections.title: 提交援助申请
helpsections.helptext:
当您在使用论坛软件遇到问题需要 IPS 提供援助的时候,您可以通过申请系统给我们提交申请. 您的申请可能需要 24-48 小时来处理.

helpsections.title: 论坛权限管理
helpsections.helptext:
您可以在这里设置您论坛的一些访问权限.您可以直接点击会员组右边的下拉菜单来设置哪些论坛会员可以查看,可以发表等等.

用户组使用显示与此权限有关的用户组. 会员使用 显示单独使用此权限的特殊会员. 预览 提供一个方便快捷直观的权限预览图示.

helpsections.title: Topic Multi-Moderation
helpsections.helptext: With multi-moderation, you can combine multiple moderator actions into one easy shortcut. For example if your forum doesn't allow advertisement topics, you can create one for advertisement/spam messages. You can have a single moderator option to close the topic and add a stock reply to it. The possibilities are really open to what your specific needs are.

helpsections.title: 创建新会员
helpsections.helptext: 当您需要添加管理员帐号的时候建议直接用管理后台添加.这将省去您很多不必要的注册激活等步骤.

helpsections.title: 设置会员评分
helpsections.helptext:
评分的图标会显示在会员头像之下.
这项设置允许您更改,删除,或者添加评分.您可以选择星形图标的数量来评分.您可以自定义此显示图片.提醒,图片必须保存在 '/style_images/{img_dir}/folder_team_icons' 此安装目录.

helpsections.title: IPB图库
helpsections.helptext: 这是一个单独的论坛插件.它为您的论坛提供了一个图库,会员可以上传自己的图片来创建属于自己的相册.需要购买,请联系我们的销售团队. 如果您已经购买了此插件,需要IPS为您安装,请提交一份援助申请.

helpsections.title: IPB博客
helpsections.helptext: 这是一个单独的论坛插件.它为您的论坛提供了一个个人博客系统(网页博客).可以作为一个简单的个人日志记录工具.需要购买,请联系我们的销售团队.如果您已经购买了此插件,需要IPS为您安装,请提交一份援助申请.

helpsections.title: ParaChat 配置
helpsections.helptext: ParaChat 是一个论坛可用的简易聊天软件.由第三方软件提供支持.您可以在下面看到此公司的一些信息. 如果您想要购买 ParaChat,请您填写他们提供的必要信息提交即可.

helpsections.helptext: AddOnChat 是一个论坛可用的聊天软件. 由第三方软件提供支持.您可以在下面看到此公司的一些信息. 如果您想要购买 ParaChat,请您填写他们提供的必要信息提交即可.

helpsections.title: 提交帮助申请
helpsections.helptext:
如果您在使用 IPB 的过程中需要官方的援助或者支持,您就可以利用我们的申请系统提交一份申请.您的申请会在24-48小时内处理.

helpsections.title: 缺陷报告
helpsections.helptext:
你可以在我们的追踪栏目里提交并跟踪您所提交的所有缺陷,它将显示在下面.这里并不 包括发布的报告,仅仅只为了弥补我们的程序内部缺陷.

helpsections.helptext:
resources.invisionpower.com is a customer-only resource site where you can find helpful articles, modifications, skins, and customer-to-customer support. Note that all content and advice found on resources.invisionpower.com is provided as-is by the individual user, and is not endorsed nor support by Invision Power Services, Inc. helpsections.title: IPB 文档中心
helpsections.helptext: 这里您可以下载一些 IPB 在线文档资源. 涵盖了包括一般使用者和管理员都需要的信息.对于皮肤和模板设计者,我们提供了全套 CSS 指导和开发文档.

helpsections.title: 联系 IPS
helpsections.helptext: 如果您想要联系我们,您可以在下面找到我们当前的联系方式和回馈时间.

helpsections.title: Finding & Pruning Members
helpsections.helptext:
You can Search for a member on your forum from here. Just enter any or none of the fields to bring up the results. On the next page you can edit their account by clicking the drop-down next to their name.
To Prune / Mass Delete members, simply select Find Members to Prune (Mass Delete) for the field Type of Search. You will also need to select some restrictions on who to prune, so fill in the other fields as desired.

helpsections.title: User Groups
helpsections.helptext: User Grouping is a quick and powerful way to organize your members. There are 4 preset groups that you cannot remove (Validating, Guest, Member and Admin) although you may edit these at will. A good example of user grouping is to set up a group called 'Moderators' and allow them access to certain forums other groups do not have access to.

helpsections.title: Managing Locked User Accounts
helpsections.helptext:
This section allows you to see which member accounts are currently locked. It also allows you a way to manually unlock these accounts. An account will become locked after the same IP address fails to log into it after a certain amount of time.
You can manage these settings by clicking here.

helpsections.title: Tip regarding "Expected Input Format"
helpsections.helptext:
If you enter n, for example, the user will only be able to enter one number. This limits the amount of information they can enter. So as an example, if you wanted a (5 character) 'Zip Code' field, you would put the expected input format as: nnnnn
Anything besides 5 numbers would be rejected. They would not be able to enter more or less numbers either.

helpsections.title: Adding Custom Profile Fields
helpsections.helptext: Custom Profile fields can be used to add optional or required fields to be completed when registering or editing a profile. This is useful if you wish to record data from your members that is not already present in the default board.

helpsections.title: 清空论坛
helpsections.helptext:
此操作将删除论坛所有主题,帖子和投票. 出现否撤销.
的论坛将不会选中 - 继续操作之前请再次确认.

helpsections.title: 为版面指定主题
helpsections.helptext: 您可以为版面添加或者删除指定主题.当您指定了主题的时候,所有会员都将使用这个主题,他们自己的设置将失效.

helpsections.title: 版规设置
helpsections.helptext: 您可以为您的板块设置使用规则.它会直接在板块上面显示出来或者只是显示链接.任何进入此版面的人都会看到版规,即使实在发表/回复主题的时候也一样.

helpsections.title: 论坛访问权限
helpsections.helptext:
选中即可访问,反之则禁止访问.
如果您禁止访问,会员就看不见此板块.

helpsections.title: 编辑论坛设置
helpsections.helptext:
如果您需要调整已经存在论坛的权限(谁可以阅读,发表,回复主题),在论坛管理页面点击'编辑权限'即可.
在此页面您可以开启发表选项,主题评分,投票, HTML,和其他的论坛功能.

helpsections.title: IPB 诊断工具
helpsections.helptext:
运行这些增强工具需要花费一些时间.
在系统概况里您将看到服务器的一些基本情况,包括您的 SQL 和 PHP 版本.您也可以查看此 IPB 的相关升级历史.

如果您遇到 IPS 驱动错误,请运行数据库检察工具.如果您遇到论坛缓慢,确认您的数据库索引已经开启.如果您遇到上传方面的问题,请检查您的文件权限.最后,如果您遇到空白页面,请确认您的安装文件里面没有空白文件.

helpsections.title: 数据库检查
helpsections.helptext: 如果您遇到数据库方面的错误(通常都会显示IPS 驱动错误).请点击左边的链接开始检查修复.

helpsections.title: 数据库索引检查
helpsections.helptext: 数据库索引能让您的数据库更加快速有效的运行.如果索引出现任何错误,您的论坛可能会变得比预期的缓慢.请点击左边的链接开始检查修复.

helpsections.title: 文件权限检查
helpsections.helptext:
如果您的文件或者文件夹权限错误,论坛的某些附件,主题,和表情就不能正常上传.
IPB 在运行的时候对某一些文件或者文件夹会需要不同的权限设置来写入数据.在 Windows 系统下,您需要确认文件的"读/写" 权限, 如果是 Unix/Linux 您就需要确认文件的"777 属性".

helpsections.title: 空格文件检查
helpsections.helptext:
如果在 PHP 标签之外出现空格,就会造成空白文件或者输入畸形的 HTML 结果.检查结束以后您需要删除 PHP 标签之外的空格或者空白换行.

PHP 标签开始于:
<?php or <?

PHP 标签结束于:
?>

helpsections.title: Managing Your Database
helpsections.helptext:
In this section you can manage your database. For most beginners, this section is of little use unless there is an IPS Driver Error. If you are encountering such an error, please check the "Rows" column in this section. If you see any of the row without a number whatsoever, please check the checkmark next to that database table. At the bottom, use the drop-down menu and select "Repair Selected Tables."
If you continue to get IPS Driver Errors, please run the Database Checker.

helpsections.title: Registration Statistics
helpsections.helptext:
The Statistics Center allows you to view the stats of your forum, ranging from number of number of PMs to number of Topic Views, and so on.
Note: The statistics generated are based on the information currently held in the database, they do not take into account pruned forums or delete posts, etc.

helpsections.title: 管理您的组件
helpsections.helptext:
所有安装过的组件都会在这里显示.您可以点击"允许"栏目下面的图标来快速开启或者禁用组件.

- 这个图标表示此组件已经在论坛被启用.点击它就可以禁用此组件.
- 这个图标表示此组件已经在论坛禁用. 点击它就可以启用此组件.

请访问 组件标签来设置您的组件.

helpsections.title: 会员邮件日志
helpsections.helptext: 论坛所有会员的邮件这里都有记录.但是不会记录一些比较大的邮件,订阅邮件, 和论坛的系统邮件.

helpsections.title: 管理员操作记录
helpsections.helptext: 您可以查看或者删除管理员话管理员在管理后台的一些操作记录(例如论坛面板,会员面板,群组面板,帮助文件,和版主操作记录).此操作不会再记录.

helpsections.title: 邮件错误日志
helpsections.helptext: 当您使用邮件系统的时候遇到错误,错误信息会被记录在这里以备查看.如果论坛所有的邮件系统都出现错误,请确认您的邮件设置是否正确.

helpsections.title: 搜索引擎日志
helpsections.helptext:
如果您的论坛有搜索引擎蜘蛛访问,那么他们的操作将被记录在这里.需要提醒您的是此功能会使用服务器的大量存储资源来存储日志.建议您设置 精简日志来解决此问题.
想要记录哪些特殊的搜索引擎,请查看搜索引擎蜘蛛配置页面.

helpsections.title: 警告日志
helpsections.helptext: 如果您设置了警告系统,这里就会记录所有会员的警告记录.请注意,删除警告记录并不能降低会员的警告级别.

helpsections.title: 管理员登录日志
helpsections.helptext:
这里显示每一次尝试登录管理后台的记录.会现实登录已经成功或者属于非法侵入.如果您发现了一个非法入侵的 IP 地址,建议您把这个地址添加到 过滤列表里.
您也可以设置错误登录的次数,超过此数字自动执行操作.点击这里进行设置.

helpsections.title: 安全中心
helpsections.helptext: 所有这些工具都不是必须的,强烈建议您在运行它们之前先仔细阅读相关的说明.如果您不确定,请阅读我们的文档.如果您有任何问题,请提交一份援助申请.

helpsections.title: 管理员列表
helpsections.helptext: 如果您在查看列表的时候发现不认识的帐号或者不该具有管理员权限的帐号,请立即移除他们的管理权限.您可以点击会员名字后面的"编辑"来移除.

helpsections.title: 管理面板权限设置
helpsections.helptext: 如果您需要能访问管理面板的管理员,但是他们不在总管理员组里,您可以限制他们在管理面板里的操作. 点击右边的下拉菜单选择搜索添加管理员.

helpsections.title: 支付网关管理
helpsections.helptext:
支付网关能让会员方便的支付论坛的付费项目.为了使用网关,您需要在对应的公司开设帐号.例如,如果您想使用 PayPal,您就必须先在PayPal 网站注册一个帐号.
选择网关右边的下拉菜单 设置支付网关...来设置.

helpsections.title: Subscription Manager - Editing a Gateway
helpsections.helptext: This page is used to configure the payment gateway information. If you are unsure of any of this information, such as Seller ID, Gateway Associated Email Address, etc., please contact this specific gateway provider, and they can supply you with the information needed.

helpsections.title: Subscription Manager - Managing Your Packages
helpsections.helptext:
A package is what the user will subscribe to. Common setups for this include:
Setting up a recurring package every month that promotes users to another group. This is useful if you wish to allow paying members access to separate sections of the board.
Setting up a Donator type group that never expires. This will allow people who provide money to your board to be placed in a specially selected group.

helpsections.title: Subscription Manager - Currency Manager
helpsections.helptext:
Currency Information
The currency you set as default becomes the currency the subscriptions are based in. For example, if you chose USD as default, entering a value of 1.00 for a subscription package means that the subscription package costs 1.00 USD. If you choose another default you may want to edit all the subscription values as they will become incorrect. Also if you choose another default, you will also want to edit the exchange values.

For up-to-date currency conversion, visit XE.com.

helpsections.title: Subscription Manager - Manually Add Transaction
helpsections.helptext:
Using this section, you can manually add a transaction for a user. Please note that if this is done, this user will not have to pay for the transaction, but will have the privileges of anyone who has paid.
Note: If you wish to have this user revert back to their previous group after the subscription ends, be sure to put their current under Previous Group.

helpsections.title: Subscription Manager - Adding a New Gateway
helpsections.helptext:
Note: This section is mostly for advanced users who are familiar with PHP and coding custom modules.
To install a new payment gateway module, simply upload the file 'class_gw_{name}.php' into '/sources/classes/paymentgateways' and then click on the 'install' link. Modules showing as 'installed' are active and can be set up from within the 'Manage Payment Gateways' link.

helpsections.title: Applying Permissions to a Calendar
helpsections.helptext: Using the drop-down to the right of each calendar, you can edit the settings for it. On this page you will have the option to select which groups can create new events, see events, and so on. It is important to set this information, or no one will be able to use your calendar.

helpsections.title: Using Badword Filters
helpsections.helptext:
The badword filter allows you to globally replace words from a members post, signature and topic title. You can add/edit and remove bad word filters in this section. As a note, by default the Admin group can bypass the badword list. You can change this by editing this group on the Manage User Groups page.

Loose matching: If you entered 'hell' as a bad word, it will replace 'hell' and 'hello' with either your replacement if entered or 6 hashes (case insensitive).
Exact matching: If you entered 'hell' as a bad word, it will replace 'hell' only with either your replacement if entered or 6 hashes (case insensitive).
Import a Badword List: You can use this if you have a pre-made badword list XML file. An example one is available in our Knowledge Base. Simply search for badword.

helpsections.title: Banning Members
helpsections.helptext:
To ban an existing member, simply go to the Manage Members page, find and edit their account, and finally switch their Primary User Group to Banned. This will stop them from viewing the board when logged in. To ban certain IPs from viewing the board, or to ban certain emails or username names from signing up, you can use this section.

Note: You can use * as a wildcard in any Username, IP, or Email filter. (Example: 127.0.*, *@yahoo.com, bannedname*). Also ensure there are no spaces before or after your ban filter - in some cases this will cause the filter to not work properly.

helpsections.title: Adding New Attachment Types
helpsections.helptext: On this page you can alter existing attachment types and add new ones. To add a new one, use the 'Add New Attachment Type' button at the bottom of the page. This is useful if your board is geared towards a specific subject where non-standard attachments need to be uploaded.

helpsections.title: Attachment Mini-Image
helpsections.helptext:
This image will need to be stored in:
/style_images/{imgdir}/folder_mime_types/

For example, the information you would enter would be: folder_mime_types/music.gif
Be sure this image is uploaded for each one of your custom image sets.

helpsections.title: Changing a Login Name
helpsections.helptext: Please note that this is the name the user will login with. This does not change the name that is displayed on the board. To change that, select the Edit Member's Display Name... from the drop-down menu on the previous page.

helpsections.title: Changing a Display Name
helpsections.helptext: Please note this is the name the user is shown as. This does not change the name they login with. To change that, select the Edit Member's Log In User Name... from the drop-down menu on the previous page.

helpsections.title: Suspending a Member
helpsections.helptext: The suspension system is an automated temporary ban. Simply choose the duration of the suspension and submit the form below. It will suspend this member for the amount of time given, and automatically unsuspend them when that time is up.

helpsections.title: Deleting Member Posts / Topics
helpsections.helptext: Note: There is NO undo for this. If you run this, all of the posts and topics from the members will be lost. If you have a Trash Can Forum setup, you can select the Use Trash Can? option to move them there.

helpsections.title: Calendar Permissions
helpsections.helptext: Please ensure that the Calendar Permissions of this section are filled out. Otherwise no one will be able to see this calendar - not even you.

helpsections.title: Creating a New Group
helpsections.helptext: Most of the time when a new group is created, separate permissions for this group are wanted. If this is the case for you, please first create a new permission set on the Manage Permissions page. Once you have created a new permission set for this group, come back to this page and for the option 'Use which permission sets...', select the newly created permission set. Now when you go to edit your forum permissions, your new group/set will appear.

helpsections.title: Create a New User Group?
helpsections.helptext: Since you have just created a new permission set, if you wish to create a new user group to use this set, simply go to the Manage User Groups section.

helpsections.title: ACP Help System
helpsections.helptext:
Welcome to the ACP Help System
This system will provide more advanced information on specific settings and pages in your Admin Control Panel.
For pages that hold more information, you will see a box just like this one.
For individual settings, an image will appear next to them, which you can click for more information. The image will appear as:

You can minimize each box by using the minimize icon in the top right of each box. To turn these help boxes off:
Click here to be sent to the settings page for this.
Alternatively you can simply navigate to the Tools & Settings tab, click on General Configuration, and then set ACP Help System to No.

helpsections.title: Editing the Board Header and Footer Wrapper
helpsections.helptext:
This section controls the basic layout of your board. You will be able to move certain sections around in this section. For example if you wanted, you could move the member bar above the board header, etc.
Editing this will copy the changes to any children skins of this set.

If you would like assistance with custom skin changes, it is recommended to visit our official resource site resources.invisionpower.com.

helpsections.title: Editing Your Templates
helpsections.helptext:
This section will provide you a way of editing the template HTML. This is useful if you want to tweak a certain section of your board. The templates use standard HTML formatting in most areas. Templates are seperated by where they appear on the board -- For example, the board header is in the 'All Global HTML' section, while the code for topics is held in the 'Topic View' area, and so on.

If you would like assistance with custom skin changes, it is recommended to visit our official resource site resources.invisionpower.com.

helpsections.title: Edit the CSS (Stylesheet) Colors
helpsections.helptext:
The CSS (Stylesheet) controls the colors and appearance of your board. Using this form, you can edit the way your board looks.

Need help? View the Online Color Picker for help with the color codes. A full CSS/colors guide is available on our Documentation page. If you would like assistance with custom skin changes, it is recommended to visit our official resource site resources.invisionpower.com.

helpsections.title: Exporting & Importing
helpsections.helptext:
On this page you can create a backup of your current skin and import new skins to your board.

Exporting... The skin set is comprised of two separate XML files - the Skin Template XML and the Images XML. Be sure to select both of these when exporting if you want to export your entire skin. Exporting is useful when backing up your skin.
Importing... This where you import new skins. You can download new skins using a resource site such as resources.invisionpower.com. When a skin has been downloaded, it will come with two files - one for the skin template and one for the images. Be sure to import both of these taking note to each field when importing, and adjusting accordingly.

helpsections.title: Skin Template HTML Differences
helpsections.helptext: This tool is useful when comparing the changes made to one of your skin sets against that of the master default template. To run a differences report on an existing skin, please go to the Skin Manager, and select Generate Differences Report... from the drop-down next to the skin.

helpsections.title: Skin Remapping
helpsections.helptext:
This sections allows you to force a skin set to be used based off the URL someone is viewing. An example of usage is if you wish to make all profiles have use the same skin set:

For Type use Contains. This will look for any URL that contains your specified input. For URL enter showuser . Finally select the Skin Set to assign to this. Now whenever someone views a profile (which has "showuser" in the URL) it will show the skin you have selected.
Note this is not limited to profiles - this tool can control any section of the forum you want. You just need to enter the URL of the page(s) you want to have a different skin.

helpsections.title: Managing & Editing Languages
helpsections.helptext: The language system controls all of the text that is shown on your board as well as the text sent in board emails. This section allows you to view your currently installed skin sets, edit the language bits, see how many members are using the language, among other things. To edit a language, simply click the Edit link next to the language.

helpsections.title: Editing Language Files
helpsections.helptext: Editing your language files is similiar to edit the skin HTML templates. Languages are grouped by how and where they display on the board. For example, to edit the text in the global header, you would edit the file lang_global. To edit the language sent in emails from the board, edit the file lang_email_content.

helpsections.title: Emoticon Manager
helpsections.helptext:

To edit emoticons, click the name of the set you wish to edit. This will show all emoticons currently in that set.
To upload new emoticons, be sure to click the checkbox next to each folder you want to upload the emoticon into, and then upload the emoticons using the forms at the bottom of the page. Note all emoticons will be copied to the 'default' folder as well as the folder selected.
To assign a set to a skin, visit the Skin Manager section. Next to the skin you wish to assign one to, click Edit Settings, and there will be an option to assign an emoticon set.

helpsections.title: Task Manager
helpsections.helptext:
The task manager contains scheduled tasks for your board. Please note that these tasks are run only when the board is accessed, so the 'Next Run' time is to be used as a guide only, as it depends on how often your board gets traffic.

Icon legend:
- This image is for advanced users who wish to set up a cron job for the tasks. This is useful if the board is not accessed often, but you want the tasks to run exactly on time.
- If this image turns red, it means this task needs to be run. To run a task, simply click on this icon and it will run the selected task.

helpsections.helptext: The portal plug-ins are modules that control what is seen on the IPB Portal page. You can edit the settings for each plug-in by clicking the drop-down to the right of each one.

helpsections.title: Previous & Current Bulk Emails
helpsections.helptext: This page allows you to view any past and current bulk emails. You can resend any previous ones, and check the status of ones that are currently being sent. To send a new bulk email, simply click the Create New Email link in the menu to the left of this page.

helpsections.title: User Groups
helpsections.helptext: User Grouping is a quick and powerful way to organize your members. There are 4 preset groups that you cannot remove (Validating, Guest, Member and Admin) although you may edit these at will. A good example of user grouping is to set up a group called 'Moderators' and allow them access to certain forums other groups do not have access to.

helpsections.title: Deleting a User Group
helpsections.helptext: Note: There is NO UNDO for this. If you delete the group, the only way to get it back it is to recreate the group and move all the members back into it one by one.

helpsections.title: Recounting & Rebuilding
helpsections.helptext:
Please read each description carefully. Some tools are resource intensive, while others have no way to undo the changes made. Tools such as Rebuild Post Content may take a long time to complete - please be patient and do not close the window until it is completed.
Rebuild Post Content is useful if you recently upgraded your board and certain elements are not showing correctly. If your BBCode, emoticons, or formatting is not showing up correctly, you may want to consider running this tool.

helpsections.title: Board Help Files
helpsections.helptext: Help Files are displayed to your users when they click the Help link in the board header. The articles cover basic usage of the default board. If you have common questions or areas that need clarification, you can add your own articles here for your users to view.

helpsections.title: 系统设置
helpsections.helptext:
这里包括了论坛设置的主要部分,设置选项都进行了分组. 您可以在下面看到这些设置组信息. 如果您需要进行一些特殊设置, 您也可以使用下面窗口右上角的搜索功能来帮助您找到.
每一个设置组通常都有对应的帮助窗口.您也可以点击特殊设置边上的帮助图标()来获取更多的信息.

helpsections.title: Having Trouble Staying Logged In?
helpsections.helptext:
Cookies are stored on each user's computer, and helps them stay logged in after they have left the board. For help on what to enter for the settings, click the help icon next to the settings. If your users are having trouble staying logged in, please check:
Create a stronghold auto-log in cookie? - As noted in the setting description, this enhances the security of your cookies. But it can also cause issues with users who have dynamic IP addresses. You may wish to turn this off to see if this helps the users stay logged in.

helpsections.title: 论坛显示繁忙? 或者变得很慢?
helpsections.helptext: 通过这里的设置将提高您的论坛承载性能.请仔细阅读每一个设置选项,并做出恰当的调整.

helpsections.title: Pruning Board Logs
helpsections.helptext: Logging is enabled by default in many areas. When logging is enabled, it can take up a large amount of database storage space. It is recommended to enable log pruning of any logs you do not view as important to your board's record keeping.

helpsections.title: Making Portal The Front Page
helpsections.helptext:
To do this, you need to edit a single PHP file for your board. If you are not comfortable doing this, we urge you to submit a ticket for assistance.

Find the file init.php in the root directory of your forum. Open it in a text editor and find the line:
define( 'IPB_MAKE_PORTAL_HOMEPAGE', 0 );

Change it to:
define( 'IPB_MAKE_PORTAL_HOMEPAGE', 1 );

Save this file and reupload it to your board. Your IPB Portal will now be the front page of your board.

helpsections.title: 安全设置
helpsections.helptext:
安全性是您论坛至关重要的部分.请仔细考虑并结合实际情况设置本页内容,并请点击帮助图标查看更加详细的帮助说明.

这个设置组将帮助您实现会员激活,垃圾信息控制和其他安全私密性的功能.
如果您在查看了相关功能说明和帮助信息之后仍然不理解,那么请保留原来的默认设置不作更改.

helpsections.title: 附件迷你图
helpsections.helptext:

helpsections.title: IP.Downloads
helpsections.helptext: This is a separate product designed to plug directly into your IP.Board. It offers your users an option to share files. You can create different categories for files to be posted into, allowing one place to upload, download, and share all types of files. To purchase, please contact our Sales Team. If you have already purchased this product and would like IPS to install it for you, please create a new Support Ticket.
